snippet: A third day of sentencing hearings was overshadowed by disclosures that the South African track star had been making monthly payments to his girlfriend’s family.
abstract: Third day of sentencing hearings for Oscar Pistorius are overshadowed by disclosures that he had been making monthly payments to family of his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, after shooting her to death in Feb 2013; news of the transactions are disclosed by probation officer testifying for the defense.
lead_paragraph: A third day of sentencing hearings was overshadowed by disclosures that the South African track star had been making monthly payments to his girlfriend’s family.

headline.main: Payments by Oscar Pistorius Take Center Stage at Hearing
headline.print_headline: Payments by Pistorius Take Center Stage at Hearing
